About Me

Just a brief introduction

BIO

My name is Unumandakh Bayandelger, but everyone calls me Uno. I'm an international student from Mongolia studying in American Univeristy in Bulgaria (or AUBG in short). Lately, I have been interested in learning web development and its technologies. In the next few months, I am planning to create a complex full-stack project that implements numerous relevant technologies to challenge myself.

Below, you can find the latest 3 projects of mine.

Mastermind

C++

A desktop GUI game application based on SFML library. Includes various data structures and algorithms (unlike the others, this is a course project).

Tic Tac Toe

Javascript

One of my bigger JS projects. Implements minimax algorithm to make the bot unbeatable.

Housekeeping Assistant

Java

Integrated Desktop GUI management software with various technologies. Complex calculations take place based on the user's input, such as schedule management, appointment, and so on.
